entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:44AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A line of thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Lincoln, southeastern Stevens, northern Spokane and southwestern Pend Oreille Counties through 1215 PM PDT... At 1143 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles north of Davenport to 15 miles southwest of Cheney. Movement was northeast at 50 mph.

entry.title: Flood Watch issued July 10 at 6:27AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of North Central Washington, including the following county, Okanogan.
